channel.title: Web Scraping on Travis Green
channel.description: Recent content in Web Scraping on Travis Green

item.title: L. Detective Conan Web Scraper
item.description: Yay! We convinced our buddy (Doug) to watch Detective Conan! However, he already read the manga and doesn’t want to watch episodes that he’s already read. No worries! Let’s use the data at Detective Conan Wiki to compile a list of episodes that weren’t in the manga.
